meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>magnet</kanji> <kanji>stone</kanji> is a <vocabulary>magnet</vocabulary>. Magnets look like little stones, right?
readingMnemonic: The 磁 reading makes sense. The しゃく reading for 石 is an exception. To remember this, just think how you are using a magnet to find this <reading>shack</reading> (しゃく) full of other magnets. It pulls you towards the shack, and when you find it and open it, all the magnets fly out and crush you because of magnety reasons.
